info.title: TXS003MI - VAT registration number validation policy

get.summary: Adds a VAT Registration Number Validation Policy
get.description: Adds a VAT Registration Number Validation Policy

200.description: The transaction was executed as requested

parameters.name: CSCD
parameters.description: Country(3)

parameters.name: VRPO
parameters.description: Validation method(2)

parameters.name: VRRE
parameters.description: VAT responsible(10)

parameters.name: VRME
parameters.description: Method to calculate expiration date(2)

parameters.name: VRDV
parameters.description: Days between validation(3)

parameters.name: VRNI
parameters.description: Name included(1)

parameters.name: VRSI
parameters.description: Street included(1)

parameters.name: VRPI
parameters.description: Postal code included(1)

parameters.name: VRCI
parameters.description: City included(1)

parameters.name: VADV
parameters.description: Add VAT(1)

parameters.name: VRNR
parameters.description: Company VAT registration number(16)

parameters.name: VCOL
parameters.description: Confirmation letter(1)

parameters.name: STFR
parameters.description: Street address from(5)

parameters.name: cono
parameters.description: The company context to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: divi
parameters.description: The division context to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: lanc
parameters.description: The language code to use. Defaults to user default

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale to use

parameters.description: The time zone to use

parameters.description: Max number of records returned. 0 is unlimited

parameters.description: Date format to use

parameters.description: When true, empty fields are omitted in response
